description.description: The description of the disk image being imported.

format.description: The format of the disk image being imported. One of `VHD` or `VMDK`.

url.description: The URL to the Amazon S3-based disk image being imported. It can either be a https URL (https://..) or an Amazon S3 URL (s3://..). One of `url` or `user_bucket` must be set.

userBucket.description: The Amazon S3 bucket for the disk image. One of `url` or `user_bucket` must be set. Detailed below.
